tcBm581i-lWHFCn-h.name: Cowardice

from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

tu_JIqYjBiBYrWHEB.name: Overconfidence
tu_JIqYjBiBYrWHEB.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

from experienced NPCs

ttGpSGGk368Y4SMDe.name: Sadism
ttGpSGGk368Y4SMDe.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to indulge your desires and know you shouldn’t (e.g., because the prisoner is one who should be released unharmed). If you fail, you cannot restrain yourself.
